results.t: Abnormal Gait: Gait Disorder Types, Causes & Treatments
Abnormal Gait: Gait Disorder Types, Causes & Treatments

results.p: 1. a manner of walking or moving on foot 2. a sequence of foot movements (such as a walk, trot, pace, or canter) by which a horse or a dog moves forward.
a particular way of walking: He walked with a slow stiff gait. the particular way a horse walks or runs: The pony's gait slowed from a canter to a trot.
results.t: GAIT | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary

results.p: by AHM Ataullah · 2023 · Cited by 20 — Gait, the pattern of walking or running, is a fundamental aspect of human movement, and disruptions to this pattern can signal underlying health issues ...
by J Vazquez-Galliano · Cited by 2 — Normal gait is a series of rhythmical, alternating movements of the trunk and limbs which results in the forward progression of the center of gravity.
results.t: Biomechanic of Gait and Treatment of Abnormal Gait Patterns

results.p: Gait, the act and manner of walking, is a learned complex motor skill that facilitates locomotion. Although it can be performed automatically and without ...
